resources.string: EXAMPLE: with joy, adhering to the view that there is nothing wrong with stealing, a boy spontaneously steals an apple from a fruit shop.

Included in combination with 19 cetasikas: 
 7 - universal 
 Starter Application (Vitakka) 
 Sustainable application (Vicāra) 
 Determination (Adhimokkha) 
 Energy (Viriya) 
 Enthusiasm (Pīti) 
 Desire to act (Chanda) 
 Misconception (Moha) 
 Shamelessness (Ahirika) 
 Fearlessness of evil deeds (Anottappa) 
 Worry (Uddhacca) 
 Greed (Lobha) 
 Erroneous View (Diṭṭhi)
